bio.home: Harlingen, South Padre, Brownsville, McAllen, Texas
bio.openEndedText:
Hi Guests! Thank you so much for choosing Color Inn Rentals LLC.

Let me begin by saying that we are the leading host in trips and reviews in all of the Rio Grande Valley! Working 24/7, around the clock to ensure we are here for you when you need us. We are locally owned and operated and the most experienced Hosts in all of McAllen, Harlingen, Brownsville, South Padre and the rest of the valley! My team of professionals are all car enthusiast and love to provide the best customer service! My name is Jesse, current owner and CEO of Color Inn Rentals. I have worked with cars my entire life and have great knowledge in choosing the very best vehicles, so you can rest assure you will be riding the best vehicles in the market when you rent from us. In my past I have done everything from fixing small mechanical issues to building some of the highest performing race engines. I have a degree in Electrical Engineering and worked as a Full time Stock Analyst and Trader. We look forward to one day putting our company in the stock market so that you all may be part owners of this growing company. I come from very humble beginnings, raised by immigrant parents and am here to accomplish the American Dream. Much of our profits go to helping poor families in need.

We are proud to operate locally in the Rio Grande Valley. It's great to be able to work together with all other business owners here. South Texas is an amazing place to live, work and visit! We are very excited to offer the best vehicles that get you to your vacation, your business trip, weddings, graduations, your family gatherings, and everything in between.

The cars at Color Inn Rentals are the upgraded , performance models and not the base as some others you'll find on Turo. This allows you to not only have a vehicle for your trip but to also have a fun time while driving to your destinations. These vehicles are maintained by the finest mechanics in the Valley. Although we do not have the newest years, we have the newest models. They are serviced regularly and we guarantee the cleanest cars. We have a great lineup of cars that will soon be added to the platform and we look forward to sharing these cars with you.

Thank you for your consideration. You are in great hands and great care with us. We know you will be happy with your experience with us!!
